name: Stellar CLI (Soroban) v23.1.2 + Rust 1.82 + Node 20
postCreateCommand: echo '=== Iniciando instalación de Stellar CLI (Soroban) v23.1.2 ===' && curl -sSfL https://stellar-cli.stellar.org/install.sh | bash -s -- v23.1.2 && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.stellar-cli/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc && echo '=== Verificando Stellar CLI... ===' && stellar --version && rustup target add wasm32v1-none && echo '=== Actualizando Cargo deps... ===' && cd contracts/blocks_resources && cargo update && echo '=== Instalación completada! ==='
